extendedInfo.description: Create set lists and share them with your band members! Use the live mode to see the current song's info on stage or at rehearsals and switch to the next song by MIDI or manually.Demo version can be downloaded here: http://www.audio-evolution.com/ccount/click.php?id=80On one hand, you can maintain your songs, set lists and performances and on the other hand you can 'play back' a performance: in this 'live' mode you will see the current and next song's title, artist, notes and additional settings like patch numbers or whatever you like. In addition to that, you can even let it show a blinking tempo bar with the correct tempo you have stored with the song! You can go to the next or previous song by pressing a button or...You can even use the MIDI switching facility to go to the next and previous song! Connect a USB MIDI interface to your phone or tablet running Android 3.2 or higher, set your MIDI control change numbers in the preferences and switch songs from your floor controller!Please use the free USB MIDI Monitor app to see if your USB MIDI interface is working before purchasing the app if you wish to use the MIDI switching facility. You can find a number of tested devices there as well.Enter new songs in the app, import them from your friends or import CSV files that can be easily made on desktops.This is the template files for CSV:http://www.audio-evolution.com/downloads/SetList.csvYou can also use this Excel sheet and then export to CSV in Excel:http://www.audio-evolution.com/downloads/SetList.xlsWe appreciate any feedback!! Please report any bugs or wishes by email instead of writing negative reviews!

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Would be great (and 5 stars) if it could send midi out to change patches on my instruments like ios set list maker can.
reviews.author: Michiel Betel

reviews.title: Good App!
reviews.comment: As someone who plays in 3 bands and has trouble remembering what I wrote (chords and lyrics), this app is a simple way to remind myself what I should be doing. Will try it out at practice on Wednesday and see how it performs in a live situation.
reviews.author: Ollie Stench

reviews.title: Great start, only needs chord pro support and MIDI out
reviews.comment: IMO, it only needs chord pro support to import songs and MIDI out to send patch selection for the song. Multi patch placement within songs would give it 8 or 10 star status for me. Another very nice app though, from the Audio Evolution developer!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really great app
reviews.comment: And an active developer too! I look forward to putting this to more use now that I know how to change the font sizes to display all my settings ... Rooted ICS 4.0.4.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why wasn\'t this written 2 years ago?!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been wanting something like this for ages to manage set lists etc.  Does exactly as it says - and the tempo flasher is a great idea.
reviews.author: A Google User
